entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy early this evening. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind southeast 30 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.
